Trigger.name: atQuestmaster
Trigger.script:
--cecho("\n<:red><black>atQuestmaster Trigger\n")
--Loop to check Banned Questmasters questing.QuestmasterLong = matches[2]
enableTimer("atQuestmaster")
command = "meh"

TriggerGroup.name: newQuests
TriggerGroup.script:
--This should always be disabled, --it is activated by the timer newQuests.
--cecho("
<:red><black>newQuests Trigger
")
questing.Questmaster = matches[2] --cecho("
<:red><black>" ..varQuesting.Questmaster.. " is the questmaster.")

TriggerGroup.name: newQuestsTitle
TriggerGroup.script:
--cecho("\n<:red><black>newQuestsTitle Trigger\n")
questing.QuestTitle = matches[2] questing.QuestUnavail = false
if matches[4] ~= nil then questing.QuestReason = matches[4] end
if matches[3] == "Unavailable" then --cecho(" \n<:red><black> Unavailable") questing.QuestUnavail = true end

Trigger.name: newQuestsInformation
Trigger.script:
--cecho("<:red><black>newQuestsInformation Trigger\n")
questing.QuestRepeatable = matches[2] questing.QuestOptimal = matches[3]
if matches[4] ~= nil then questing.QuestFading = matches[4]
end
--Loop to check Banned Quests
if questing.QuestUnavail == false then cecho(" \n<:red><black>" ..questing.Questmaster.. " is offering the quest " ..questing.QuestTitle.. ", it is optimally for level " ..questing.QuestOptimal.. " With fading experience at level " ..questing.QuestFading) send("Quest Request " ..questing.QuestTitle) elseif questing.QuestUnavail == true then cecho(" \n<:red><black>" ..questing.Questmaster.. " is not offering the quest " ..questing.QuestTitle.. " because you " ..questing.QuestReason) end
questing.QuestTitle = "" questing.QuestReason = ""

Trigger.name: newQuestsDescription
Trigger.script: --cecho("subConsole", "<:DimGrey><black> This regex doesn't work right so it is replaced with this echo\n")

Trigger.name: newQuestsEndOnPrompt
Trigger.script:
--cecho("\n<:red><black>newQuestsEndOnPrompt Trigger\n")
setTriggerStayOpen("newQuests",0)
questing.Questmaster = "" questing.QuestTitle = "" questing.QuestUnavail = "" questing.QuestReason = "" questing.QuestRepeatable = "" questing.QuestOptimal = "" questing.QuestFading = ""
disableTrigger("newQuests")

TriggerGroup.name: updateQuests

Trigger.name: updateQuestsTitle
updateQuestsGoals
EndGetCurrentQuestTitle
Trigger.script:
--cecho("<:red><black>Ending GetCurrentQuestsTitle") setTriggerStayOpen("GetCurrentQuestsTitle",0)
questing.QuestGoalsComplete = true for i=1, #questing.QuestGoals do if questing.QuestGoals[i] == false then questing.QuestGoalsComplete = false end end
if questing.QuestGoalsComplete == true then --cecho("<:red><black>This quest is complete") table.insert(questing.QuestsCompleted, questing.QuestTitle) elseif questing.QuestGoalsComplete == false then --cecho("<:red><black>This quest is incomplete") table.insert(questing.QuestsIncomplete, questing.QuestTitle) end
questing.QuestGoals = {}

Trigger.name: updateQuestsDescription
Trigger.script: --cecho("\n<:red><black>updateQuestsDescrition Trigger\n")

Trigger.name: updateQuestsEndOnPrompt
Trigger.script:
--cecho("\n<:red><black>updateQuestsEndOnPrompt Trigger\n")
setTriggerStayOpen("updateQuests",0)
questing.Questmaster = "" questing.QuestTitle = "" questing.QuestUnavail = "" questing.QuestReason = "" questing.QuestRepeatable = "" questing.QuestOptimal = "" questing.QuestFading = ""
disableTrigger("updateQuests") enableTimer("completeQuests")

Trigger.name: is here!
Trigger.script:
if scripter.Kill then send("kill " .. scripter.Target)
end

Trigger.name: isDirectionFromHere

local dir = matches[3]
send(dir)

Trigger.name: Get Direction when Following
Trigger.script: if tostring(matches[2]) == scripter.target then direction = tostring(matches[3]) CatchupTimer = tempTimer(1.5,[[scripter.catchup = true]]) end

Trigger.name: KillTimer
Trigger.script: if matches[2] == scripter.target then killTimer(CatchupTimer) scripter.catchup = false killTimer(scripter.huntdelay) killTimer(scripter.rangeTimer) scripter.inRange = true scripter.followstatus = true end

Trigger.name: Catchup
Trigger.script: scripter.catchup = true send("scan")

regexCodeList.string: You try to follow, but (.*) is moving too quickly.

Trigger.name: Follows you
Trigger.script: if not scripter.statusFollowing then send("party form") send("party invite "..matches[2]) scripter.statusFollowing = false else send("point "..followTarget) end

Trigger.name: You follow
Trigger.script: scripter.statusFollowing = true scripter.followTarget = matches[2] if scripter.killing then expandAlias(KillClick) end

Trigger.name: You stop following
Trigger.script: scripter.statusFollowing = false

Trigger.name: Invited
Trigger.script: send("party join "..matches[2]..";follow "..matches[2]) scripter.Target = matches[2]

regexCodeList.string: (\w+) has invited you to join the party.

Trigger.name: finger
Trigger.script:
local wornObject = string.gsub(matches[3], "Artifact", "<span style=\"color: red;\">Artifact<span style=\"color: lightgrey;\">") local wornObject = string.gsub(wornObject, "Glowing", "<span style=\"color: yellow;\">Glowing<span style=\"color: lightgrey;\">") local wornObject = string.gsub(wornObject, "Humming", "<span style=\"color: white;\">Humming<span style=\"color: lightgrey;\">") local wornObject = string.gsub(wornObject, "Magic", "<span style=\"color: purple;\">Magicfact<span style=\"color: lightgrey;\">") local wornObject = string.gsub(wornObject, "Spiked", "<span style=\"color: grey;\">Spiked<span style=\"color: lightgrey;\">") local wornObject = string.gsub(wornObject, "Visored", "<span style=\"color: grey;\">Visored<span style=\"color: lightgrey;\">") local wornObject = string.gsub(wornObject, "Bound", "<span style=\"color: teal;\">Bound<span style=\"color: lightgrey;\">")
UI.equipment.RingCount = tonumber(UI.equipment.RingCount) + 1
if tonumber(UI.equipment.RingCount) == 1 then if tostring(matches[2]) == "Nothing" then UI.equipment[1] = "Nothing"
else UI.equipment[1] = wornObject

Trigger.name: PermTopLine
PermExtraLines
Trigger.script:
local C1 = UI.theme.Color2
local C2 = UI.theme.Color6
local stat = "<" .. C2 .. ">modifies<" .. C1 .. "> " .. matches[2] local amount = "<" .. C2 .. ">by<" .. C1 .. "> " .. matches[3] local timer = "<" .. C2 .. ">permanently"
table.insert(UI.affects[affect], tostring(stat)..","..tostring(amount).. "," .. tostring(timer))
if gagmode == true then deleteLine()
end

Trigger.name: TimerTopLine
Trigger.script:
local C1 = UI.theme.Color2
local C2 = UI.theme.Color6
setTriggerStayOpen("PermTopLine",0) setTriggerStayOpen("TimerTopLine",0)
affect = matches[3] local stat = "<" .. C2 .. ">modifies<" .. C1 .. "> " .. matches[4] local amount = "<" .. C2 .. ">by<" .. C1 .. "> " .. matches[5] local timer = matches[6]
local formatedHours = rex.match(tostring(timer), [[(\d+)\shour(s){0,1}]]) local formatedMinutes = rex.match(tostring(timer), [[(\d+)\sminute(s){0,1}]]) local formatedSeconds = rex.match(tostring(timer), [[(\d+)\ssecond(s){0,1}]])
local formatedTimer = "<" .. C2 .. ">"
if tonumber(formatedHours) ~= nil then formatedTimer = formatedTimer .. formatedHours .."h:"
end
if tonumber(formatedMinutes) ~= nil then formatedTimer = formatedTimer .. formatedMinutes .. "m:"
end
if tonumber(formatedSeconds) ~= nil then formatedTimer = formatedTimer .. formatedSeconds .."s"
end
UI.affects[affect] = {tostring(stat)..","..tostring(amount)..","..tostring(formatedTimer)}
if gagmode == true then deleteLine()
end

Trigger.name: TimerExtraLine

local formatedHours = rex.match(tostring(timer), [[(\d+)\shour(s){0,1}]]) local formatedMinutes = rex.match(tostring(timer), [[(\d+)\sminute(s){0,1}]]) local formatedSeconds = rex.match(tostring(timer), [[(\d+)\ssecond(s){0,1}]])
local formatedTimer = "<" .. C2 .. ">"
if tonumber(formatedHours) ~= nil then formatedTimer = formatedTimer .. formatedHours .."h:"
end
if tonumber(formatedMinutes) ~= nil then formatedTimer = formatedTimer .. formatedMinutes .. "m:"
end
if tonumber(formatedSeconds) ~= nil then formatedTimer = formatedTimer .. formatedSeconds .."s"
end
table.insert(UI.affects[affect], tostring(stat)..","..tostring(amount)..","..tostring(formatedTimer))
if gagmode == true then deleteLine()
end

Trigger.name: treasure loot
Trigger.script:
local treasure = {[[coin of the defiler]], [[fragment of the fallen]], [[unaligned soul]], [[(Aftifact)]], [[piece of the Goddess]], [[pulsing piece of Chaos]] }
local corpses = {[[corpse]], [[pile of dust]]}
local grabbedObj = matches[2]
local grabbedFrom = matches[3]
local isLoot = false
for k,v in pairs(corpses) do if rex.match(grabbedFrom, v) == ture then isLoot = true break
end
end
if isLoot == true then for k,v in pairs(treasure) do if rex.match(grabbedObj, v) == true then local message = "You looted some Treasure" if tostring(message) ~= tostring(UI.feedlastmessage) then UI.feedlastmessage = message echo("UI.FeedList",message .. tostring(getTime(true,"hh:mm:ssap")))
end
end
end
end

Trigger.name: Prompt Data
Trigger.script:
if scripter.On == true then if tonumber(xPrompt.hp) < 85 then local message = "Your HP has fallen below scripters threshold" if tostring(message) ~= tostring(UI.feedlastmessage) then UI.feedlastmessage = message echo("UI.FeedList",message .. tostring(getTime(true,"hh:mm:ssap")))
end
end
end

Timer.name: resizeTimer
Timer.script:
--This should be disabled by default
--Get window size local main_width, main_height = getMainWindowSize() --cecho("<firebrick>[ ALERT ] - <white_smoke>sysWindowResizeEvent: ".. ResizeMan.main_width .."x".. ResizeMan.main_height .."
")
--Calculate new console size local left = (tonumber(main_width)/4) --cecho("<firebrick>[ ALERT ] - <white_smoke>Left Set to "..left.."
") local right = (tonumber(main_width)/4) --cecho("<firebrick>[ ALERT ] - <white_smoke>Right Set to "..right.."
") local top = 0 --cecho("<firebrick>[ ALERT ] - <white_smoke>Top Set to "..top.."
") local bottom = (tonumber(main_height)/10) --cecho("<firebrick>[ ALERT ] - <white_smoke>Bottom Set to "..bottom.."

")
-- Set Main Window Size setBorderBottom(bottom) setBorderLeft(left) setBorderRight(right) setBorderTop(top)
--Set Main Window Font and Font Size --setFont("main", UI.Font) --setFontSize("main", UI.FontSize)
disableTimer("resizeTimer")

Alias.name: UITheme custom
Alias.script:
local color1 = matches[15] local color2 = matches[16] local color3 = matches[17]
local matched1 = false local matched2 = false local matched3 = false
local message = "Error: "
for k,v in pairs(UI.colors) do
if string.lower(color1) == string.lower(v) then matched1 = true color1 = tostring(v)
end
if string.lower(color2) == string.lower(v) then matched2 = true color2 = tostring(v)
end
if string.lower(color3) == string.lower(v) then matched3 = true color3 = tostring(v)
end
end
if matched1 == false or matched2 == false or matched3 == false then
if matched1 == false then message = tostring(message) .. tostring(color1) .. ", "
end
if matched2 == false then message = tostring(message) .. tostring(color2) .. ", "
end
if matched3 == false then message = tostring(message) .. tostring(color3) .. ", "
end
message = tostring(message) .. "-is invalid, Check your selections and try again." ncom(message)
else UI.ThemeCustom(color1, color2, color3)
end

Alias.name: UIPrompt prompt
Alias.script:
local prompt = string.lower(matches[10])
if tostring(prompt) == "noax" then send("prompt %c^rHP %h ^bMana %m ^gMove %v ^yExp %X^o, ^wStyle:^o %C^w Room:^o %r ^wExits:^o %e%c^^")
elseif tostring(prompt) == "marcho" then send("prompt %c^rHEALTH %h ^bMANA %m ^gMVM %v ^wSTIL ^o%C ^yXP %X ^wDirections ^o%e ^wHungry ^o%B %c^^")
elseif tostring(prompt) == "obsc" then send("prompt %c^w<^r%hhp ^b%mmn ^g%vmv^w> <^o%t^w> <^o%C^w> <^y%X^w>%c^^")
elseif tostring(prompt) == "newbie" then send("prompt %c^w<^r%h^r/ hp ^b%m/ m ^g%v/ mv^w> [^y%X^w]%c^^")
elseif tostring(prompt) == "all" then send("prompt %c^w<^r%hhp ^b%mm ^g%vmv^w>%c^^")
elseif tostring(prompt) == "creation" then send("prompt %c^r%h Life ^b%m Mana ^g%v Moves^o,^y%X XP/lvl^o>%c^^")
else ncom(tostring(prompt).. " -is invalid, Check your selections and try again.")
end

Script.name: UI
Script.script:
function UI.Initialize() UI.ConfigLoad() UI.Session = getTime() UI.StyleSheet = [[ background-color: ]] .. UI.theme.Color1 .. [[; border-width: ]] .. UI.theme.BorderWidth .. [[; border-color: ]] ..UI.theme.Color5 .. [[; border-style: ]] .. UI.theme.BorderStyle .. [[; border-radius: ]] .. UI.theme.BorderRadius .. [[; margin: 1.5px; ]] tempTimer(1,[[UI.UILeft()]]) tempTimer(1.25,[[UI.UIRight()]]) tempTimer(1.75,[[UI.UIBottom()]]) tempTimer(2.25,[[ UI.UIComms() UI.CommsClick(UI.CurrentComms) UI.UIName() UI.UINameDisplay() UI.UIChar() UI.UIItems() UI.CharClick("Items") UI.CharClick("Character") UI.UIChar2() UI.Char2Click(UI.CurrentChar2) UI.UIChar3() UI.UIAffects() UI.Char3Click(UI.CurrentChar3) UI.UIExtras() UI.UIFeed() UI.ExtrasClick(UI.CurrentExtras) ]]) end
function UI.Initialized() if loadError == false then tempTimer(0.5,[[ UI.booted = true cecho("\n") ncom("Everything is all loaded! For Information and Help enter \'UIHelp\'") ]]) tempTimer(1,[[ UI.booted = true send("\n") ]]) elseif loadError == true then tempTimer(1,[[ cecho("\n") ncom("Boot process has failed, Please check your alerts and try again.") ]]) end end
function UI.UpdateLabels() UI.UILeftUpdate() UI.UIRightUpdate() UI.UIBottomUpdate() UI.UICommsUpdate() UI.UINameUpdate() UI.UICharUpdate() UI.UIExtrasUpdate() UI.UIChar2Update() UI.UIChar3Update() UI.UINameDisplay() end
function UI.ConfigLoad() local luaFiles = {[[boons]], [[boonsDetail]], [[casting]], [[character]], [[colors]], [[defenses]], [[equipment]], [[items]], [[name]], [[offense]], [[theme]], [[traits]], [[traitsDetail]],}
for i = 1, #luaFiles do
UI[luaFiles[i]] = UI[luaFiles[i]] or {}
if io.exists(getMudletHomeDir().. "/" .. luaFiles[i] .. ".lua") then table.load(getMudletHomeDir().. "/" .. luaFiles[i] .. ".lua",UI[luaFiles[i]])
else acom("Missing Component: " .. luaFiles[i] .. ".lua") loadError = true return
end
end end
function UI.ConfigSave() --needs a rewrite end
function UI.UpdateGuages() if UI.name.Name == "Tim" then return end UI.HPBar:setValue(tonumber(xPrompt.hp), 100, nil) UI.HPBar:setText("<center><strong>" .. tostring(xPrompt.hp) .. "% HP") UI.ManaBar:setValue(tonumber(xPrompt.mana), 100, nil) UI.ManaBar:setText("<center><strong>" .. tostring(xPrompt.mana) .. "% Mana") UI.MoveBar:setValue(tonumber(xPrompt.move), 100, nil) UI.MoveBar:setText("<center><strong>" .. tostring(xPrompt.move) .. "% Move") if tonumber(xPrompt.exp) >= 100 then xPrompt.exp = 100 end UI.ExpBar:setValue(tonumber(xPrompt.exp), 100, nil) UI.ExpBar:setText("<center><strong>" .. tostring(xPrompt.exp) .. "% Experience") end

Script.script:
function UI.UpdateLabelScripter() if UI.name.Name == "Tim" then return end local ON = "OFF" if UI.scripter.On == true then ON = "ON" else ON = "OFF" end local AREA = UI.scripter.Area local TARGET = UI.scripter.Target local KILL = "off" if UI.scripter.Kill == true then KILL = "On" else KILL = "Off" end local BUTCHER = "off" if UI.scripter.Butcher == true then BUTCHER = "On" else BUTCHER = "Off" end local SKIN = "off" if UI.scripter.Skin == true then SKIN = "On" else SKIN = "Off" end local SOUP = "off" if UI.scripter.Soup == true then SOUP = "On" else SOUP = "Off" end local DISARM = UI.scripter.Disarm or "none" local AUTO = UI.scripter.Auto or "none" local OFF = UI.scripter.OffAuto or "none" local C1 = UI.theme.Color2 local C2 = UI.theme.Color6 local FONT = UI.theme.Font local SIZE = UI.theme.FontSize local ScripterCard = {} local StatusCard = { "
Scripting is " .. ON .. "
", "
", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "
Area:" .. AREA .. " Target:" .. TARGET .. " Kill:" .. KILL .. "
", }; local AutomationCard = { "
Automation
", "
", "", "", "", "", "", "", "
Your Autoaction is " .. AUTO .. " Periodically you will " .. OFF .. " 
", "
", "", "", "", "", "", "
When disarmed you will wield " .. DISARM .. "
", "
", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "
Soup:" .. SOUP .. " Butcher:" .. BUTCHER .. " Skinning:" .. SKIN .. "
", }; local StatsCard = {}; table.insert (ScripterCard, table.concat(StatusCard,"")) table.insert (ScripterCard, table.concat(AutomationCard,"")) table.insert (ScripterCard, table.concat(StatsCard,"")) echo("UI.Scripter", table.concat(ScripterCard,"")) end

Script.name: UI.UpdateLabelFeed
Script.script:
function UI.UpdateLabelFeed() if UI.name.Name == "Tim" then return end local SESSION = UI.Session local CURRENT = getTime() local DAYS = tonumber(CURRENT.day) - tonumber(SESSION.day) local HOURS = tonumber(CURRENT.hour) - tonumber(SESSION.hour) if tonumber(HOURS) < 0 then DAYS = tonumber(DAYS) - 1 HOURS = tonumber(HOURS) + 24 end local MINUTES = tonumber(CURRENT.min) - tonumber(SESSION.min) if tonumber(MINUTES) < 0 then HOURS = tonumber(HOURS) - 1 MINUTES = tonumber(MINUTES) + 60 end local C1 = UI.theme.Color2 local C2 = UI.theme.Color6 local FONT = UI.theme.Font local SIZE = UI.theme.FontSize local FeedCard = { "
", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "
Session Start: " .. SESSION.month .. "\\" .. SESSION.day .. "\\" .. SESSION.year .. " " .. SESSION.hour .. ":" .. SESSION.min .. "  Elapsed time: " .. DAYS .. "d " .. HOURS .. "h " .. MINUTES .. "m 
", }; echo("UI.FeedDetails", table.concat(FeedCard,"")) end

Script.name: UI.UpdateLabelAffects
Script.script:
function UI.UpdateLabelAffects() if UI.name.Name == "Tim" then return end
local C1 = UI.theme.Color2
local C2 = UI.theme.Color6
clearWindow("UI.AffectsList") UI.AffectsList:resetAutoWrap ()
cecho("UI.AffectsList", "<" .. C1 .. ">You are affected by:\n")
if UI.affects == nil then return
end
for k1,v1 in pairs(UI.affects) do
for k2,v2 in pairs(UI.affects[k1]) do
local affect = k1 local stat = rex.match(tostring(v2), [[^(.*)\,.*\,.*$]]) local amount = rex.match(tostring(v2), [[^.*\,(.*)\,.*$]]) local timer = rex.match(tostring(v2), [[^.*\,.*\,(.*)$]])
if tonumber(k2) == 1 then local line = "<" .. C1 .. ">" .. affect .. " " .. stat .. " " .. amount .. ", " .. timer .. "\n"
cecho("UI.AffectsList", line)
else local line = " " .. stat .. " " .. amount .. ", " .. timer .. "\n"
cecho("UI.AffectsList", line)
end
end
end
end

Script.name: UI.Theme
Script.script:
function UI.Theme(theme)
if tostring(theme) == "xaos" then UI.theme.Color1 = "DimGrey" UI.theme.Color5 = "yellow" UI.theme.Color6 = "DarkGoldenrod"
elseif tostring(theme) == "reldi" then UI.theme.Color1 = "DimGrey" UI.theme.Color5 = "red" UI.theme.Color6 = "firebrick"
elseif tostring(theme) == "blue" then UI.theme.Color1 = "DimGrey" UI.theme.Color5 = "blue" UI.theme.Color6 = "MidnightBlue"
elseif tostring(theme) == "green" then UI.theme.Color1 = "DimGrey" UI.theme.Color5 = "green" UI.theme.Color6 = "DarkGreen"
elseif tostring(theme) == "purple" then UI.theme.Color1 = "DimGrey" UI.theme.Color5 = "DarkViolet" UI.theme.Color6 = "purple"
elseif tostring(theme) == "turquoise" then UI.theme.Color1 = "DimGrey" UI.theme.Color5 = "turquoise" UI.theme.Color6 = "CadetBlue"
elseif tostring(theme) == "grey" then UI.theme.Color1 = "DimGrey" UI.theme.Color5 = "LightGrey" UI.theme.Color6 = "DimGrey"
elseif tostring(theme) == "noax" then UI.theme.Color1 = "firebrick" UI.theme.Color5 = "MidnightBlue" UI.theme.Color6 = "red"
elseif tostring(theme) == "gobs" then UI.theme.Color1 = "white" UI.theme.Color5 = "orange" UI.theme.Color6 = "DarkOrange"
elseif tostring(theme) == "solious" then UI.theme.Color1 = "red" UI.theme.Color5 = "red" UI.theme.Color6 = "white"
elseif tostring(theme) == "white" then UI.theme.Color1 = "white" UI.theme.Color5 = "white" UI.theme.Color6 = "white"
elseif tostring(theme) == "black" then UI.theme.Color1 = "black" UI.theme.Color5 = "black" UI.theme.Color6 = "DimGrey"
elseif tostring(theme) == "random" then local color1 = math.random(1,#UI.colors) local color2 = math.random(1,#UI.colors) local color3 = math.random(1,#UI.colors) UI.theme.Color1 = UI.colors[color1] UI.theme.Color5 = UI.colors[color2] UI.theme.Color6 = UI.colors[color3]
else ncom("Invalid theme selection.")
end
UI.UpdateLabels()
end

Script.name: xPrompt
Script.script:
function xPrompt.Initialize() xPrompt.ConfigLoad() end
function xPrompt.ConfigLoad() local path = profilePath .. "/ui/xPrompt.lua" if io.exists(path) then table.load(path, scripter) else ncom("Missing Component: /xPrompt.lua") loadError = true return end end
--Xaos compatible replacement for the isPorompt function of mudlet. --Function uses lrexlib to match lines from the mud with known Xoas prompts. --If you would like a prompt to be added to this function just tell Noax. --To use it set a trigger pattern type to Lua function with a pattern of 'return isXaosPrompt()' function isXaosPrompt() --Noax Prompt Syntax 'prompt %cHP %h Mana %m Move %v Exp %X, Style: %C Room: %r Exits: %e%c' if rex.match(tostring(line), [[^HP (\d+)\% Mana (\d+)\% Move (\d+)\% Exp (\d+)\%\, Style\: (.*?) Room\: (.*?) Exits\: (.*?)$]]) ~= nil then xPrompt.hp, xPrompt.mana, xPrompt.move, xPrompt.exp, xPrompt.style, xPrompt.room, xPrompt.room, xPrompt.exits = rex.match(tostring(line), [[^HP (\d+)\% Mana (\d+)\% Move (\d+)\% Exp (\d+)\%\, Style\: (.*?) Room\: (.*?) Exits\: (.*?)$]]) return true --Xaos builtin Syntax 'prompt newbie' elseif rex.match(tostring(line), [[^\<(\d+)\%\/ hp (\d+)\%\/ m (\d+)\%\/ mv\> \[(\d+)\%\]$]]) ~= nil then xPrompt.hp, xPrompt.mana, xPrompt.move, xPrompt.exp = rex.match(tostring(line), [[^\<(\d+)\%\/ hp (\d+)\%\/ m (\d+)\%\/ mv\> \[(\d+)\%\]$]]) return true --Xaos builtin Syntax 'prompt all' elseif rex.match(tostring(line), [[^\<(\d+)\%hp (\d+)\%m (\d+)\%mv\>$]]) ~= nil then xPrompt.hp, xPrompt.mana, xPrompt.move = rex.match(tostring(line), [[^\<(\d+)\%hp (\d+)\%m (\d+)\%mv\> $]]) xPrompt.exp = 0 return true --Xaos builtin at craracter creation elseif rex.match(tostring(line), [[^(\d+)\% Life (\d+)\% Mana (\d+)\% Moves,(\d+)\% XP\/lvl\>$]]) ~= nil then xPrompt.hp, xPrompt.mana, xPrompt.move, xPrompt.exp = rex.match(tostring(line), [[^(\d+)\% Life (\d+)\% Mana (\d+)\% Moves,(\d+)\% XP\/lvl\>$]]) return true --Marcho's XUI Prompt Syntax 'prompt HEALTH %h MANA %m MVM %v STIL %C XP %X Directions %e Hungry %B %c' elseif rex.match(tostring(line), [[^HEALTH (\d+)\% MANA (\d+)\% MVM (\d+)\% STIL (.*) XP (\d+)\% Directions (.*) Hungry (.*) $]]) ~= nil then xPrompt.hp, xPrompt.mana, xPrompt.move, xPrompt.style, xPrompt.exp, xPrompt.exits, xPrompt.hunger = rex.match(tostring(line), [[^HEALTH (\d+)\% MANA (\d+)\% MVM (\d+)\% STIL (.*) XP (\d+)\% Directions (.*) Hungry (.*) $]]) return true --Obscillesk Prompt Syntax 'prompt <%hhp %mmn %vmv> <%t> <%C> <%X>' elseif rex.match(tostring(line), [[^\<(\d+)\%hp (\d+)\%mn (\d+)\%mv\> \<(.*)\> \<(.*)\> \<(\d+)\%\> $]]) ~= nil then xPrompt.hp, xPrompt.mana, xPrompt.move, xPrompt.time, xPrompt.style, xPrompt.exp = rex.match(tostring(line), [[^\<(\d+)\%hp (\d+)\%mn (\d+)\%mv\> \<(.*)\> \<(.*)\> \<(\d+)\%\> $]]) return true --Solious Prompt (%r)(%e)%c(%Xxp)(%t)%c(%hhp %mm %vmv) elseif rex.match(tostring(line), [[^\((\d+)\%hp (\d+)\%m (\d+)\%mv\) $]]) ~= nil then xPrompt.hp, xPrompt.mana, xPrompt.move = rex.match(tostring(line), [[^\((\d+)\%hp (\d+)\%m (\d+)\%mv\) $]]) xPrompt.exp = 0 acom("Your Prompt sucks") return true else return false end end

Script.name: resizeEventHandler
Script.script:
--Do NOT Rename or disable this script, it will break the function
function resizeEventHandler( event, x, y ) --Seems like nosense to diable a timer then to enable it but it allows --for rappid firing of sysWindowResizeEvent thus avoiding lagg during the event.
disableTimer("resizeTimer")
enableTimer("resizeTimer")
end registerAnonymousEventHandler("sysWindowResizeEvent","resizeEventHandler")

Script.name: uiLauncher
Script.script:
version = "2.0.0.2"
profilePath = getMudletHomeDir() profilePath = profilePath:gsub("\\","/")
downloadPath = "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/nsweeting2/XaosUI/master"
files = {[[/boons.lua]], [[/boonsDetail.lua]], [[/casting.lua]], [[/character.lua]], [[/colors.lua]], [[/defenses.lua]], [[/equipment.lua]], [[/items.lua]], [[/name.lua]], [[/offense.lua]], [[/scripter.lua]], [[/theme.lua]], [[/traits.lua]], [[/traitsDetail.lua]], [[/xPrompt.lua]], [[/xaosui.xml]],}
registerAnonymousEventHandler("sysConnectionEvent", "eventHandler") registerAnonymousEventHandler("sysDownloadDone", "eventHandler") registerAnonymousEventHandler("sysDownloadError", "eventHandler") registerAnonymousEventHandler("bootUI", "eventHandler")
function downloadVersions() local path, file = profilePath .. "/ui", "/versions.lua" if not io.exists(path) then lfs.mkdir(path) end downloading = true downloadFile(path .. file, downloadPath .. file) end
function checkVersions() downloading = false local path = profilePath .. "/ui/versions.lua" local versions = {} table.load(path, versions) local pos = table.index_of(versions, version) or 0 if pos ~= #versions then enableAlias("installui") cecho("\n<BlueViolet>[ Noax ]<DarkSlateGrey> - XaosUI is out of date, enter <white>updateui<DarkSlateGrey> to install!") else cecho("\n<BlueViolet>[ Noax ]<DarkSlateGrey> - XaosUI is up to date, continuing with boot.") raiseEvent("bootUI") end end
function installUpdate() --if not downloading and corefiles is 5 local path = profilePath .. "/ui/xaosui.xml" disableAlias("installui") uninstallPackage("xaosui") installPackage(path) cecho("\n<BlueViolet>[ Noax ]<DarkSlateGrey> - XaosUI has been installed, continuing with boot.") tempTimer(2,[[raiseEvent("bootUI")]]) end
function downloadUpdate() coreFiles = 0 downloadTimeout = tempTimer(60,function() coreDownloadFailed("timer") end) cecho("\n<BlueViolet>[ Noax ]<DarkSlateGrey> - Downloading XaosUI, please wait.") downloading = true local path = profilePath .."/ui" --cecho("\n <DarkSlateGrey>Getting ") for k,v in pairs(files) do --cecho("<DarkSlateGrey>"..v..", ") downloadFile(path..v, downloadPath..v) end --cecho("<DarkSlateGrey>from\n "..downloadPath) end
function coreDownloadFinished() coreFiles = tonumber(coreFiles) + 1 if coreFiles == tonumber(#files) then cecho("\n<BlueViolet>[ Noax ]<DarkSlateGrey> - XaosUI has been downloaded, proceeding with install!") installUpdate() end end
function coreDownloadFailed(arg) cecho("\n<BlueViolet>[ Noax ]<DarkSlateGrey> - A XaosUI component download has failed, install can not proceed.") cecho("\n<DarkSlateGrey> Reason: "..arg) end
function bootUI() loadError = false tempTimer(.25,[[xPrompt.Initialize()]]) tempTimer(.75,[[UI.Initialize()]]) tempTimer(1,[[questing.Initialize()]]) tempTimer(1.25,[[scripter.Initialize()]]) tempTimer(1.5,[[UI.Initialized()]])
end
function eventHandler(event,...) if event == "sysConnectionEvent" then downloadVersions() elseif event == "sysDownloadDone" then local file = arg[1] if string.ends(file, "/versions.lua") then checkVersions() end for k, v in pairs(files) do if string.ends(file, v) then coreDownloadFinished() break end end elseif event == "sysDownloadError" then local file = arg[1] if string.ends(file, "/versions.lua") then coreDownloadFailed(file) end for k, v in pairs(files) do if string.ends(file, v) then coreDownloadFailed(file) break end end end end
